name: express-ssl-starter-kit
description: A simple SSL enabled express.js server with certificate generate helper script

scripts.gen-crt: openssl genrsa -des3 -passout pass:x -out server.pass.key 2048 &&  openssl rsa -passin pass:x -in server.pass.key -out server.key && rm server.pass.key && openssl req -nodes -new -key server.key -out server.csr && openssl x509 -req -days 365 -in server.csr -signkey server.key -out server.crt && rm server.csr

author: jens alexander ewald
